meanings.definition: A movement of part of the body, especially a hand or the head, to express an idea or meaning.
meanings.sent1: She used small gestures to show she was happy.
meanings.sent2: He made a gesture with his hand to indicate he wanted to stop.
meanings.sent3: The robot's gestures were so exaggerated, it looked like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her gestures spoke louder than words, conveying her emotions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The magician's gestures were so precise, it seemed like he was casting a spell.

meanings.definition: A signal or sign made with the body or hand to convey information or instructions.
meanings.sent1: The traffic officer's gestures directed the cars smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She made a gesture with her head to signal that it was time to leave.
meanings.sent3: The mime's gestures were so clear, even without words, everyone understood.
meanings.sent4: His gestures were like a secret code, only understood by his closest friends.
meanings.sent5: The coach's gestures on the sideline guided the players to victory.
